**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 31 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 [Living-Sun Spire](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1706) **Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 57 **Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +30 **Str** +9 **Dex** +2 **Con** +8 **Int** -5 **Wis** +0 **Cha** -5 --- **AC** 36 (32 when broken) **Fort** +29 **Ref** +19 **Will** +17 construct armor **HP** 200 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Construct Armor** Like normal objects, the living sun-spire has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage the sun-spire takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once a sun-spire is reduced to fewer than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, removing the Hardness and reducing its Armor Class to 32.
**Steal the Sun** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) **Trigger** A creature within 30 feet of the sun-spire begins to Cast a Spell that has the [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) or [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100) trait; **Effect** The sun-spire attempts to redirect the energy from the triggering effect into its sunlight stores. The sun-spire attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering spell with a +22 counteract bonus. If it successfully counteracts the spell, the sun-spire's sunlight stores are empowered. While empowered, the sun-spire deals an additional 2d8 fire damage with all of its attacks and abilities. The sun-spire remains empowered until the end of its next turn. --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** arm +28 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+11 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Melee** spear +28 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+11 piercing **Ranged** sunfire beam +28 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 3d8+11 fire **Beam of the Seven Suns** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The sun-spire collects solar energy and uses the energy to create a deadly beam of fire. It fires the beam in a 120-foot line, dealing 11d8 fire damage to all creatures in the line (DC 33 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The concentrated beam ignites everything in its path, including the air, creating a wall of burning flame along the line that continues to burn until the end of the sun-spire's next turn. This wall has the effects of a 5th-level [_wall of fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) spell, dealing 5d6 fire damage to any creature that crosses the wall or occupies the wall's area at the start of its turn. The sun-spire can't use the Beam of the Seven Suns again for 1d4 rounds, although rounds it's not in sunlight don't count toward this number. **[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** Large or smaller, arm, DC 33
name: Living-Sun Spire
